descriptionHtml:
Notice: I am currently taking a break from modding. If you're looking for permission to use my assets, assume the answer is yes. This includes converting to SSE or Xbox SSE

Adds the Ogrims from Morrowind. Feel free to use it in any mods.

To acquire the summon, go into the console and type "help ogrim" then type player.additem (whatever the number beside "Spell Tome: Conjure Ogrim" is)

Modeled by [url=https://mryogesh123.deviantart.com/]Yogesh[/url]ï»¿
Rigged by Jboyd4 of the Beasts of Tamriel team
Implemented by me
author: Minermanb Yogesh Jboyd4
